text: @realDonaldTrump But you did not ride to the occasion! That's the problem. You were only concerned about your re-election and tried to hide the severity of COVID19. You refused 1.5M test kits in January. Fox news spent weeks ridiculing democrats to please you. You called it a hoax. Failure!
